channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ファンタジー小説家のケイト・コレインが、偽のGoodreadsアカウントを作成し、否定的なレビューで他の小説家を妨害したことを認め、「故障」を理由に謝罪した（Alexandra Alter/New York Times）。
item.description:
Alexandra Alter / New York Times:
Fantasy novelist Cait Corrain admits to creating fake Goodreads accounts to sabotage other novelists via negative reviews, citing a “breakdown”, and apologizes  —  Cait Corrain, a debut fantasy author, admitted to creating fake accounts on Goodreads to bolster her own book and tank the ratings of others.

item.title: 英国の公聴会で、BBCのサミール・シャー委員長がゲーリー・リネカーの最近のX投稿について議論し、それをめぐる度重なる騒動はBBCの「評判を傷つける」と述べた（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
At a UK hearing, BBC Chair Samir Shah discusses Gary Lineker's recent X posts, saying that repeated rows over them does “damage to the reputation” of the BBC  —  The BBC's incoming chairman has yet to step foot on the corporation's premises, but he has already waded into his first scandal.

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの戦争をガザ内部から記録した、インスタグラムで多くのフォロワーを持つ非伝統的ジャーナリストの一人、プレスティア・アラカドのプロフィール（Ruth Michaelson/The Guardian）
item.description:
Ruth Michaelson / The Guardian:
A profile of Plestia Alaqad, one of several nontraditional journalists with large Instagram followings who have documented the Israel-Hamas war from inside Gaza  —  Plestia Alaqad went from Instagrammer to reporter after her footage of Israel's assault on besieged enclave went viral

item.title: バングラデシュの政府寄りの報道機関やインフルエンサーは、2024年1月の選挙を前に、安価なツールで作成されたAIによる偽情報を宣伝している（Benjamin Parkin/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Benjamin Parkin / Financial Times:
Pro-government news outlets and influencers in Bangladesh are promoting AI-generated disinformation created with cheap tools ahead of elections in January 2024  —  Ahead of South Asian nation going to the polls in January, AI-generated disinformation has become a growing problem

item.title: メディア・マターズがテキサス州のケン・パクストン州知事を連邦裁判所に提訴、パクストン州知事はメディア・マターズのXに関する報道について調査を開始し、憲法修正第1条に違反したとしている（David Ingram/NBC News）
item.description:
David Ingram / NBC News:
Media Matters sues Texas AG Ken Paxton in federal court, saying Paxton violated the First Amendment by opening a probe into Media Matters' reporting about X  —  In a complaint filed in federal court Monday, Media Matters asked a judge to determine whether Attorney General Ken Paxton violated its constitutional rights.

item.title: ヒプグノシス、2万曲の "非中核的 "楽曲を9月30日の評価額から14％ディスカウントの2310万ドルで売却。
item.description:
Jasper Jolly / The Guardian:
Hipgnosis sold 20K “non-core” songs for $23.1M, a 14% discount to their September 30 valuation, and plans to use proceeds to pay back some revolving credit  —  London-listed music investor sells ‘non-core’ song rights at a discount to raise cash as it battles debt pile

item.title: アンペールDisney+とHuluを合わせると、米国では他のどのサービスよりも人気タイトルが多くなり、カタログの規模はPrime Videoに次いで2位となる（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Ampere: Disney+ and Hulu combined would have more popular titles in the US than any other service and its catalog size would rank second only to Prime Video  —  The streamers' merged content catalog size would rank second only to Amazon Prime Video and ahead of Netflix, according to Ampere Analytics.

item.title: 情報源Xの広告収入は、2023年の最初の3四半期でそれぞれ6億ドル強と、2022年の四半期あたり10億ドル超から減少し、2023年には～25億ドルになる見込み（Kurt Wagner/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Kurt Wagner / Bloomberg:
Sources: X generated just over $600M in ad revenue in each of 2023's first three quarters, down from $1B+ per quarter in 2022 and on track for ~$2.5B in 2023  —  - X to miss internal goals for ad revenue, people familiar say  — Musk's personal tweets continue to scare off advertisers

item.title: Comcast、約3000万人の家庭用インターネット顧客に「Xumo Stream Box」を提供開始、最初の1台は無料、追加1台につき月額5ドル（Daniel Frankel/Next TV）
item.description:
Daniel Frankel / Next TV:
Comcast starts offering its Xumo Stream Box to its nearly 30M residential internet customers; the first device is free, and each additional one costs $5/month  —  The new joint-venture gadget replaces the Xfinity Flex puck that Comcast had been giving out for free to its broadband-only subscribers

item.title: YouTubeは11月17日、チャンネルがYouTubeパートナー・プログラムに参加しているかどうかを示すコードを削除した。
item.description:
Paresh Dave / Wired:
On November 17, YouTube removed code that said if a channel is in the YouTube Partner Program, which gives a cut of ad revenue, leaving researchers in the dark  —  YouTube removed a snippet of code that publicly disclosed whether a channel receives ad and subscription payouts, obscuring which creators benefit most from the platform.

item.title: 情報筋パラマウント・グローバルは、2023年初頭から人員削減を行ってきたが、広告市場が予想以上に低迷しているため、2024年初頭に1,000人以上の従業員をレイオフする可能性がある（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Paramount Global may lay off 1,000+ employees in early 2024, due to a weaker-than-expected ad market, after paring down its staff since earlier in 2023  —  Shari Redstone considers sale of controlling stake in National Amusements amid pressures from Paramount's cable business, ad market

item.title: Netflix、2023年1月から6月までに最も視聴されたコンテンツの詳細をまとめた「What We Watched」レポートを初公開、「The Night Agent」が8億1200万時間以上の視聴で1位（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Netflix publishes its first What We Watched report, detailing the most-watched content from January to June 2023; The Night Agent was #1 with 812M+ hours viewed  —  Netflix is going to start publishing a new report twice a year that details the most popular shows and movies on the platform.

item.title: タイニー・ニュース・コレクティブがエイミー・L・コヴァック＝アシュリーを初のエグゼクティブ・ディレクターに採用、同NPOは2021年以降、米国で25のニュースルームの立ち上げを支援したと発表（Tiny News Collective）
item.description:
Tiny News Collective:
The Tiny News Collective hires Amy L. Kovac-Ashley as its first executive director and says the nonprofit has helped launch 25 newsrooms in the US since 2021  —  A Note from Kara Meyberg Guzman, Board Chair  —  Since 2020, the Tiny News Collective's board and staff have worked to build …

item.title: ニュースリーダーズ協会理事会、2024年6月までにNLAを解散し、サンシャイン・ウィークなどの資産をジャーナリズムNPOに分配する会員投票を承認（ニュースリーダーズ協会）
item.description:
News Leaders Association:
The News Leaders Association's board approves a member vote to dissolve NLA by June 2024 and distribute assets, such as Sunshine Week, to journalism nonprofits  —  During its final meeting of the year, the News Leaders Association Board of Directors unanimously approved the NLA membership's November vote …

item.title: Snapchat+の加入者は、テキストプロンプトに基づいてAI画像を生成して送信したり、Snapchatの生成AI自撮り機能「Dream」に友人の写真を追加したりできるようになった（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Snapchat+ subscribers can now generate and send AI images based on a text prompt and add pictures of friends into Dream, Snapchat's generative AI selfie feature  —  Snapchat is releasing a few new AI powered features for Snapchat+ subscribers, the company announced on Tuesday.
